summary: ICP dapp scaffolded with a Motoko backend and a React (Vite + Tailwind + shadcn/ui) frontend featuring marketing pages, courses/articles content, Internet Identity auth hooks, and certificate verification UI.
architectural_notes: Frontend uses React + Vite with Tailwind and shadcn/ui component primitives.
Internet Identity authentication is encapsulated in reusable hooks (useInternetIdentity/useActor).
ICP canister configuration included for backend and frontend (canister.yaml + DID bindings).
Build-template includes scripts for pruning/resizing images and a standardized deployment workflow.

existing_features.title: Motoko backend canister scaffold
existing_features.description: Backend canister implemented in Motoko with DID bindings and canister configuration included for local/build-template deployment.

existing_features.title: React (Vite) + Tailwind frontend scaffold
existing_features.description: Frontend app bootstrapped with Vite/React, Tailwind styling, routing/pages, and shared layout (header/footer).

existing_features.title: shadcn/ui component library integrated
existing_features.description: shadcn/ui component set added (buttons, dialogs, forms, navigation, etc.) with project configuration and utilities.

existing_features.title: Site pages and content sections
existing_features.description: Pages implemented: Home, About, Courses, Articles, Article Detail, Resources, Contact, Privacy, Terms, and Certificate Verification.

existing_features.title: Courses and articles data modules
existing_features.description: Structured data sources for courses and articles provided via frontend data modules with corresponding UI pages.

existing_features.title: Internet Identity authentication hooks
existing_features.description: Hooks for Internet Identity integration and actor creation included (useInternetIdentity, useActor) with validation helpers.

existing_features.title: Asset generation pipeline and generated images
existing_features.description: Scripts and generated image assets added for consistent resized/dimmed marketing imagery (hero, icons, course/article images).

existing_features.title: Create a new Gallery page that displays a responsive grid of images.
Populate the Gallery page with a curated set of existing generated images already in the project so the grid has content immediately.
Add routing so the Gallery page is accessible at /gallery.
Add a “Gallery” navigation link in the site header and footer quick links.

Add the uploaded logo image as a static asset in the frontend and use it as the primary brand mark in the site header (replacing the current Shield icon) while preserving the existing site name and tagline text.
Update the site footer brand section to include the same logo next to/above the "Hackroot Organization" brand text, styled consistently with the existing footer typography and spacing.
Add favicon/app icon assets derived from the uploaded logo and update frontend/index.html to reference the favicon so browser tabs display the logo.
Create a reusable, responsive carousel component that supports multiple slides where each slide contains an image and accompanying text content.
Add a text+image carousel section to the Home page using existing generated images as slide backgrounds/illustrations and English user-facing copy.
Add a text+image carousel section to the About page using existing generated images and English user-facing copy.
Extend the courses data model to include a course price and ensure it can be displayed in Indian Rupees (INR) across the UI.
Create a Course Detail page that shows the full details for a selected course, including the course price displayed in INR, and provide a clear way to navigate back to the courses list.
Update the Courses page so the "Enroll Now" button opens the selected course’s detail view, and show the course price in INR in the course card UI.

Ensure the Courses page "Enroll Now" action always navigates to the selected course’s full detail view at /courses/$courseId and that the detail view displays the course price formatted in Indian Rupees (INR).

Update the Course Detail page layout to be fully responsive with a medium-density reading experience and ensure the full course description is always visible (no truncation/clamping or hidden overflow).
Ensure the course description shown on the Courses page cards is not visually hidden/truncated and remains readable across responsive breakpoints.

Update the site "Connect" social icon links to use the provided URLs (YouTube, LinkedIn, Instagram, Telegram) instead of placeholder "#" links wherever the "Connect"/social icons are rendered (including the footer "Connect" section and the Contact page "Follow Us" section).

new_feature_requests.summary: Add a new Gallery page that displays images in a grid.
Add a logo to the website (site branding in header/footer as appropriate).
Add a text+image carousel component/section to both the Home and About pages.
In Courses section, add an “Enroll Now” action that opens the full course detail view and display the course price in Indian Rupees (INR).
Ensure Course Detail view is responsive (medium sizing) and shows the full course description without truncation/hiding, while displaying the course price in INR.
Add social/profile links (YouTube, LinkedIn, Instagram, Telegram) to the site "Connect" section.
